TiXmlBase Class Reference

TiXmlBase is a base class for every class in TinyXml. More...

#include <tinyxml.h>

Class diagram for TiXmlBase:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

TiXmlBase is a base class for every class in TinyXml.

It does little except to establist that TinyXml classes can be printed and are all part of doubly linked lists.

Classes in the TinyXML DOM are either containment nodes or leaf nodes. No node (in a normal document) is both. 

    A Document contains:    Element (container)
                            Comment (leaf)
                            Unknown (leaf)
    An Element contains:    Element (container)
                            Text    (leaf)
                            Attributes (not on tree)
                            Comment (leaf)
                            Unknown (leaf)
    @endverbatim
